name: The Undergrowth
description:
Welcome home.

------------------------------------------------

The Undergrowth is short Metroidvania, inspired by Hollow Knight, for Karina Popp's Intermediate Game Dev class. 

You are Ako, a shy but determined boy beginning his journey to return to a home he left long ago.

But things have changed since he’s last been there. Corruption has spread through the land, and strange magical creatures are making his old home a dangerous place. Use your magic to battle your way through, and meet characters both old and new, on your way back to the Undergrowth.

------------------------------------------------

How to Play:

Use the arrow keys to Move and aim your Spell. 

Use Z to Jump. 

Use X to Cast.

Created by Seth Royston, Aaron Kuthoor, and Miles Esguerra.
